transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haanji sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Maine na ye matlab baat kari hai apne senior se bhi baat kari hai iske regarding na. Ye jo aap matlab buy buy likha hua hai na waha pe jaake isse judgement nahi hota hai. Ya toh aap ek kaam karo. Abhi fatfat lead koi consume karo koi bhi one year wali one month wali aise karke aap unko call laga ke dekho agar woh uthata hai ya kya baat karta hai. Fir isse thoda idea mil jayega mujhe bhi na. Nahi hoga toh main apne internal team se discuss karungi.
Customer: [inaudible] kaam karo. Dekhiye, pata hai ki hum log aise lead bahut sare humne purchase kare hai. Aur maine aapko ye complaint bhi dala hai isme isliye nahi ki mujhe dikh nahi raha maine already kai sare leads ko purchase kara hai. Theek hai. Lekin aap keh rahe ho aapke samne main kuch purchase karta hu. Theek hai. Aap dekho.
Executive: Main samajh gayi aapne dala hai B to B wala.
Customer: Haan aapke samne main kuch purchase karta hu. Theek hai. Aap dekho.
Customer: Ye jaise dekho, Booko Assam se electric likha hua hai. Theek hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji.
Executive: Phone ke wale recent mein?
Customer: Relevant relevant.
Executive: Recent wale dekho na woh fresh. Aapka fresh ka consumption hi sir bahut kam hai. Agar main aapki performance batau na is time pe aapka 38% jaake fresh lead ka consumption ho raha hai. Jo bahut jyada kam hai is time pe. Sabse kam hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Main aapko dikha deta hu.
Executive: Sabse pehle toh aap haan recent se uthao relevant se mat uthaya karo. Relevant wale thode purane jaate hai.
Customer: Haan. Toh main aapko recent se hi dikhata hu. Goal pada hai. Theek hai. Ek mahine pehle ki.
Customer: Aap line pe rukna.
(silence)
Speaker: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aapni je byaktir songe kotha bolchen, tini apnar call-ti hold-e rekhechen. Doya kore line-e thakun. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Speaker: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aapni je byaktir songe kotha bolchen, tini apnar call-ti hold-e rekhechen. Doya kore line-e thakun. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Speaker: The person you are speaking with
Customer: Hello mam.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Phone receive nahi hua. Haan phone receive phone receive nahi hua. Main kuch aur kuch aur try karta hu.
Executive: Achha phone receive nahi hua. Haan koi aur try kar lo.
Customer: 44 minutes pehle ka ek hai. Usko dekhna tha.
Executive: Ji.
(silence)
Speaker: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aapni je byaktir songe kotha bolchen, tini apnar call-ti hold-e rekhechen. Doya kore line-e thakun. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
Speaker: The person you are speaking with
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan abhi disconnect kar diya samne se kar diya.
Executive: Disconnect kar diya. Unko message vagera kar do aapko lead manager mein unki chat aayi hogi na. Waha pe jaake unko apna catalog ka link share kar dijiye sari. Aur ye jo aapne lead sabhi consume kari hai na un lead ka kya bolte hai time aur unka kya bolte hai number likha hota hai na woh sari mujhe WhatsApp kar dena main ek bar tester pe dal deti hu ye sari cheeze.
Customer: Kya kar du?
Executive: Aapne jo lead consume kari hai na woh lead mujhe ek bar screenshot dal dijiyega tab aapne consume kari hai unka jo number hai lead ka woh consume mere ko bata do taki main isko apne director pe dal saku ki aise karke leads aapne kari thi. Abhi koi report toh nahi aaya unka?
Customer: Nahi. Koi report nahi aaya. Abhi aapke samne jo ye jo maine consume kare hai aapko screenshot dal deta hu.
Customer: Haan mujhe sari screenshot dal do ek bar.
(silence)
Customer: Ye maine bhej diya aapko bhi.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji sir.
Customer: Haan maine bhej diya aapko screenshot.
Executive: Theek hai sir main dekh leti hu ek bar haan. Hmm. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about low fresh lead consumption.

- Customer says 'buy buy' written, doesn't allow judgement.

- Customer says phone not received on lead calls.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested consuming leads and calling.

- Executive will discuss the issue with internal team.

- Executive asked for screenshots of consumed leads.

- Customer sent screenshots of consumed leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the screenshots.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, consumption, fresh leads, screenshots
